name: VR Nara Park
description:
Experience the serene and therapeutic ambiance of VR Nara Park, a virtual environment heavily inspired by one of Japan’s most famous tourist destination, the Nara Deer Park. Travel, meditate and learn about the renowned vistas and structures that this virtual park offers, witness the picturesque sceneries while surrounded by the falling petals of the cherry blossoms, and interact with the symbolic Nara Park Deers, all without having to leave your own household.

VR Nara Park also supports Nvidia’s new DLSS 2.0 technology, enabling users with RTX GPUs to appreciate the game at its best in terms of performance and graphical fidelity.
